title: Percussion instruments
brief_description: The timpani, snare drum, cymbals, tambourine, castanets, triangle, and celesta, underline the rhythm in music. Demonstrates simple basic techniques for playing each instrument, which are heard separately and together; illustrates some of the special effects for which each may be used.
